action.action-desc: Mr. Garamendi (for himself and Mr. Rush) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans’ Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to clarify the responsibilities of small businesses with respect to the employment and reemployment rights of veterans.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Help Veterans Return to Work Act.

section.header: Small businesses and veterans’ employment rights

subsection.text: Section 4312(d) of title 38, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: in paragraph (1)(B), by inserting if such employer is a small business concern before the semicolon; and
in paragraph (2)(B), by inserting if such employer is a small business concern after on the employer.

subsection.text: Section 4303 of such title is amended by adding at the end the following new paragraph:

paragraph.text: The term small business concern has the meaning given that term under section 3 of the Small Business Act (15 U.S.C. 632).
